classes.name: Warrior
classes.description: Warriors are swordsmen who prefer melee combat and rely on their strength in combat

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: Monks are disciplined fighters who specialize in martial arts and inner harmony

classes.name: Mystic
classes.description: Mystics are spellcasters who harness the power of arcane energies for offensive and defensive purposes

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: Rogues are agile and stealthy fighters who excel in deception, evasion, and quick strikes

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: Rangers are skilled archers and trackers who specialize in long-range combat and wilderness survival

classes.name: Brutalist
classes.description: Brutalists are brute force fighters who rely on their sheer strength and heavy weaponry to overpower their enemies

classes.name: Guardian
classes.description: Guardians are resilient defenders who excel at protecting their allies and mitigating damage

classes.name: Adventurer
classes.description: Adventurers are versatile fighters who adapt to various situations and excel in exploration and resourcefulness

classes.name: Spiritualist
classes.description: Spiritualists commune with spirits and tap into the ethereal realm to wield otherworldly powers

classes.name: Elementalist
classes.description: Elementalists harness the forces of nature and manipulate the elements to unleash devastating attacks

classes.name: Mage
classes.description: Mages are arcane spellcasters who specialize in casting powerful offensive and defensive spells

classes.name: Duelist
classes.description: Duelists are masters of one-on-one combat, specializing in precise strikes, quick movements, and acrobatics

classes.name: Knight
classes.description: Knights are honorable warriors who follow a strict code of chivalry and protect the weak and defenseless

classes.name: Gladiator
classes.description: Gladiators are formidable fighters who have honed their skills in the arena, specializing in brutal melee combat

classes.name: Berserker
classes.description: Berserkers are relentless warriors who enter a state of uncontrollable fury in battle, dealing massive damage

classes.name: Avenger
classes.description: Avengers are vengeful fighters who channel their hatred and seek justice against those who wronged them

classes.name: Arcanist
classes.description: Arcanists are masters of arcane magic, wielding immense power and unraveling the mysteries of the universe

classes.name: Summoner
classes.description: Summoners command the forces of creatures and spirits, calling upon their aid in battle and magic

classes.name: Tempest
classes.description: Tempests are masters of elemental forces, wielding storms and unleashing devastating natural disasters

classes.name: Enigma
classes.description: Enigmas are enigmatic spellcasters who manipulate time and space, distorting reality to their will

classes.name: Dreadnought
classes.description: Dreadnoughts are unstoppable forces of destruction, wielding massive weapons and shrugging off damage

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: Paladins are holy warriors who combine martial prowess with divine magic, smiting evil and healing the wounded

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: Druids are nature's guardians, connected to the spirits of the wild and wielding the power of nature itself

classes.name: Purifier
classes.description: Purifiers are holy healers who cleanse and restore life, providing vital support to their allies in battle

classes.name: Oracle
classes.description: Oracles possess foresight and divine insight, predicting and manipulating future events with their powers

classes.name: Juggernaut
classes.description: Juggernauts are unstoppable forces of destruction, wielding massive weapons and shrugging off damage

classes.name: Warden
classes.description: Wardens are nature's protectors, skilled in both offensive and defensive nature-based magic and combat

classes.name: Ronin
classes.description: Ronins are masterless samurai who wander the land, using their unmatched swordsmanship and agility to defeat their enemies

classes.name: Ninja
classes.description: Ninjas are stealthy assassins who specialize in covert operations, using agility and precision to eliminate their targets

classes.name: Ethereal
classes.description: Ethereals are mystical beings who can shift between dimensions, wielding powerful ethereal magic and manipulating reality

classes.name: Assassin
classes.description: Assassins are elite killers who strike swiftly and silently, eliminating their targets with deadly precision

classes.name: Enchanter
classes.description: Enchanters are masters of enchantments and illusions, manipulating reality and deceiving their foes

classes.name: Marksman
classes.description: Marksmen are expert archers and sharpshooters, picking off enemies from a distance with deadly accuracy

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: Clerics are devoted healers and holy warriors, wielding divine magic to mend wounds and vanquish evil

classes.name: Warlock
classes.description: Warlocks are dark spellcasters who harness forbidden and chaotic magic to wield immense power

classes.name: Reanimator
classes.description: Reanimators are necromancers who have mastered the dark arts of raising and controlling the undead

classes.name: Illusionist
classes.description: Illusionists are masters of illusions and deception, manipulating perception and confusing their enemies

classes.name: Sentinel
classes.description: Sentinels are steadfast defenders who protect their allies with unwavering resolve and impenetrable armor

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.description: Sorcerers are masters of arcane magic, wielding raw power and bending reality to their will

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: Wizards are scholars of magic, specializing in the study and application of arcane knowledge

classes.name: Abolisher
classes.description: Abolishers are warriors who possess unmatched strength and skill, cleaving through their enemies with brutal efficiency

classes.name: Reaper
classes.description: Reapers are dark and sinister warriors who harness the power of death and decay to strike fear into their enemies
